channel.title: Samsung Kies update issue
channel.description:
I'm trying to update my Gio (2.3.3) to 2.3.7 through Samsung Kies.
But Kies itself want's to be updated before updating Gio's software.
I've downloaded the latest (?) version of Kies installer (Kies_2.3.0.12035_16_4.exe) and reinstalled it three times. Kies is fully up to date, but it still want's to be updated. Build-in update tool says that Kies is up to date.
Any ideas?
Or guides on how to update android on Galaxy Gio.[/SIZE] ![Capture.JPG|690x485](upload://qWPk7HxTq11Crcl1o7TgCF8AFOZ.jpeg)

item.title: Samsung Kies update issue
item.dc:creator: Zageron
item.description:
Have you tried killing Kies with fire? POS bloatware.

Read full topic

item.title: Samsung Kies update issue
item.dc:creator: FinlandGamer
item.description:
At first glance it seems okay, but it’s currently missing finnish ä, ö and swedish å letters. Only complaint that i have at this point is that when you insert a sd card, it scan it for two minutes, a lot longer than vanilla 2.3.3.

And i just noticed, i forgot to back up my notes and calendar markings.

Read full topic

item.title: Samsung Kies update issue
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
Been tempted to try cyanogen since Tmobile is taking forever to officially release ICS on my galaxy SII.

Read full topic

item.title: Samsung Kies update issue
item.dc:creator: FinlandGamer
item.description:
Nevermind, i installed Android 2.3.7 - Cyanogen Mod 7.2.0.

Problem solved.

Read full topic

item.title: Samsung Kies update issue
item.dc:creator: FinlandGamer
item.description:
Three times, and last time i manually removed all keys referring to samsung kies through regedit before installing again.

Read full topic

item.title: Samsung Kies update issue
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
Have you tried to reinstall samsung kies?
